hut.Got the candles going and

the cold, wet.There's nothing worse than the

at night.But cold and wet?

their water into the winebarrel.
When the wine barrel overflows,you move to the final task.
That is getting the picnicbasket to the finish table.
First tribe to get their basketon the table wins the reward.
